name: Rice Pudding
description: Rice, Water, Milk : Rice pudding is a dish made from rice mixed with water or milk and other ingredients such as cinnamon, vanilla and raisins. Variants are used for either desserts or dinners. When used as a dessert, it is commonly combined with a sweetener such as sugar.

name: Sausage Pizza
description: 2 cup all purpose flour,100 gm processed cheese,100 ml tomato ketchup,spicy Italian sausage,1 tomato,1/2 capsicum (green pepper),2 onion,1 teaspoon oregano.

name: Burgers and Chips
description: 1 ¼kg lean beef mince1 onion, finely chopped,140g breadcrumb,100g mature cheddar, grated,small bunch parsley, chopped,1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce,1 egg, lightly beaten with a fork,1 tsp mild chilli powder,2 ½kg bag of potato, cut into chunky chips,3 tbsp plain flour,10 tsp olive or sunflower oil,burger buns, lettuce, sliced red onion, tomatoes, gherkins, and sauces or relishes, to serve

name: Curry Rice
description: Rice or kiribath, vegetable or meat curry, spices (chili peppers, cardamom, cumin, coriander)
